name: Chabot Space & Science Center
description: Chabot Space & Science Center in the Oakland hills features interactive space science exhibits, planetarium shows, and three historic telescopes offering free public viewing nights. The center inspires curiosity about the universe and our place in it.
fullDescription: Chabot Space & Science Center in the Oakland hills features interactive space science exhibits, planetarium shows, and three historic telescopes offering free public viewing nights. The center inspires curiosity about the universe and our place in it.
whatTheyOffer:
- EBT cardholders: $5 admission per person
- Free telescope viewing: Friday and Saturday evenings (weather permitting)
- Children under 2: Free admission
- Members: Unlimited visits plus guest discounts
- Regular admission: $24 for adults, $18 for children
howToGetIt: Show your EBT card at the admissions desk for reduced admission. Telescope viewing is free and open to the public on clear Friday and Saturday nights - no reservation needed.
